alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Columbus and east central Horry Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 337 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of strong thunderstorms over Wampee, or near North Myrtle Beach Airport, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... North Myrtle Beach, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Wampee, Longs, Brooksville, Hand, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach and Sea Coast Medical Center. This includes the following highways... SC Highway 31 between mile markers 14 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 25 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
